title: Tu Di Ge Ge Shi Da Lao
overview: The story follows the aloof supreme lord of the myriad realms. He handpicks young girls, each with the potential to ascend as future deities, and embarks on a treacherous quest to reshape the destiny of the realms. Confronting formidable challenges and obstacles, will these fledgling girls triumph in their trials and forge a new world from the ashes of the old?
